name: Floating Green
description:
Colorful and emotional, what you see in this painting is completely up to you. At times resembling sunsets, landscapes and vistas there is also a completely unreal aspect. 

The central focus is a gorgeous green that hangs suspended in the middle of the frame.

• Original, one of a kind, watercolor painting on 140 lb, 9 x 12 inch, acid free, Arches watercolor paper.

• Archival/Reversible mounting on 11 x 14 inch, acid free, matte board. A hinged second matte is on top with an 8.25 x 10.75 inch opening.

• Ready to frame in a standard 11 x 14 inch frame.

• Signed and dated on the front.

• Shipped in a sealed polypropylene sleeve.

Colorful and emotional, what you see in this painting is completely up to you. At times resembling sunsets, landscapes and vistas there is also a completely unreal aspect.

name: A Fancy Pair
description:
Feathers represent lightness, mobility, air, balance, flight and joy. Sensitive to the slightest wind, they are emblems of the psyche's capacity to pick up invisible currents.

Two gorgeously colored feathers sit side by side waiting for their moment in the spot light.

• Original, one of a kind, watercolor painting on 140 lb, 9 x 12 inch, acid free, Arches cold press watercolor paper.

• Archival/Reversible mounting on 11 x 14 inch, acid free, matte board. A hinged second matte is on top with an 8.25 x 10.75 inch opening.

• Ready to frame in a standard 11 x 14 inch frame.

• Signed and dated on the front.

• Shipped in a sealed polypropylene sleeve.

name: Water Sunset
description:
Evoking landscapes, sunsets and bodies of water, these vibrant, energetic fields of balanced, harmonious color will either excite or sooth you. 

Water Sunset is comprised of a mix of warm and cool colors and the forms seem to create a horizon, land and reflections.

• Original, one of a kind, acrylic painting on 16 x 20 inch panel made of heavy-duty, warp-resistant MDF.

• Ready to hang, backed with a 1.5" cradled birch plywood frame mounted flush to the edge of the panel. The sides are painted to match the painting.

• Signed on the front. Signed and dated on the back.

• Shipped wrapped in acid free, glassine paper, bubble wrap and cardboard.

name: Fire Valley
description:
Evoking landscapes, sunsets and bodies of water, these vibrant, energetic fields of balanced, harmonious color will either excite or sooth you. 

Fire Valley is comprised of hot colors and their natural compliments. Undulating forms seem surrounded in a glowing fog.

Evoking landscapes, sunsets and bodies of water, these vibrant, energetic fields of balanced, harmonious color will either excite or sooth you.
